perturbation.changed_text:
B. Talent shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon ten (10) days prior written notice to ESSI in the event of the
occurrence of any of the following: (1) ESSI adjudicates as insolvent or declares bankruptcy余 or (2) ESSI fails to provide consideration due pursuant
to this Agreement, within ten (10) days following the date such consideration is due hereunder, provided that ESSI is notified in writing of such
non-payment by Talent and such payment by ESSI is not made within three (3) days following such notification余 or (3) ESSI breaches any
representation, warranty, covenant or agreement set forth herein and fails to cure same (if curable) within fourteen (14) days of receipt of written notice.
perturbation.explanation: The change from 'seven (7) days' to 'fourteen (14) days' creates an in-text contradiction. Paragraph 10.A gives ESSI seven days to cure a breach, while paragraph 10.B now gives Talent fourteen days for a similar breach by ESSI. This inconsistency creates ambiguity about the timeframe for curing breaches and causes uncertainty in enforcement.
